item.title: TikTok 政治回旋镖让用户感到不安
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，埃伦-休特（Ellen Huet）撰文讲述了美国 TikTok 用户在经历了导致其关闭和回归的政治风波后，对该应用的陌生和不安。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet writes about the strange, uneasy time US TikTok users are having with the app after the political whiplash that led to its shutdown and return.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战进入白热化阶段，接下来会发生什么？

item.description: 连续第二个周一，投资者被大跌惊醒。【原文：For the second Monday in a row, investors are waking up to a big selloff.】

item.title: 杠杆以太币交易商在特朗普关税大跌中措手不及
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布加征关税后投资者情绪低落，周一以太币的杠杆押注解体，使其成为受打击最严重的加密货币之一。【原文：The unraveling of leveraged bets on Ether placed the token among the hardest-hit cryptocurrencies in a selloff on Monday, as investor sentiment soured after US President Donald Trump’s tariff announcements.】

item.title: 智利经济连续第三个月增长，经济活动开始趋于稳定
item.description: 智利的经济活动在 12 月份连续第三个月增长，原因是在经历了几个月的波动之后，利率降低和铜产量强劲等因素有助于经济的稳定增长。【原文：Chile’s economic activity increased for the third straight month in December as factors including lower interest rates and strong copper production help to steady growth following months of volatility.】

item.title: 全球经济衰退之际，罗马尼亚开始出售外汇债务以弥补赤字
item.description: 在国内政治和全球投资者情绪动荡的时刻，罗马尼亚今年首次开拓国际市场。【原文：Romania is tapping international markets for the first time this year at a turbulent moment for domestic politics and global investor sentiment.】

item.title: 英国免受特朗普关税威胁提振英镑
item.description: 英镑正在成为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）贸易关税引发的全球金融市场恐慌的避风港。【原文：The pound is emerging as an unlikely haven from the global financial market jitters over US President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs.】

item.title: 谢因与安巴尼在 2020 年禁令之后低调重返印度
item.description: Shein与穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）合作，重新启动了印度业务，因为这家快时尚公司正寻求在世界上人口最多的国家挖掘买家。【原文：Shein has restarted its India operations in partnership with Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Industries Ltd., as the fast fashion seeks to tap buyers in the world’s most-populous country where it was banned in 2020 on on security fears.】

item.title: 贝森特抨击耶伦后掌舵美债销售
item.description: 斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）去年曾多次抨击珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）所在部门发行联邦债券的策略，如今，他将在周三发布的一份关键性文件中就国债销售问题作出决定，债券交易商对此意见不一。【原文：After repeatedly blasting Janet Yellen last year over her department’s strategy for issuing federal debt, it’s now up to Scott Bessent to make the call on sales of Treasuries, with bond dealers conflicted over what he’ll do in a pivotal release due Wednesday.】

item.description: 自去年夏天马尔科-科拉诺维奇（Marko Kolanovic）突然从摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A lot has happened since news of Marko Kolanovic’s abrupt exit from JPMorgan Chase & Co. last summer sent shockwaves across Wall Street.】

item.title: 智利绩优基金称高收益盛宴已结束
item.description: 2024 年对于智利一些负债最多的公司来说是个好年头，而对于 Grupo Security SA 公司高收益地方债务基金的资金经理吉列尔莫-马林（Guillermo Marin）来说，则是非同寻常的一年。【原文：It was a good year for some of Chile’s most indebted companies in 2024, and an exceptional one for Guillermo Marin, money manager of a high-yield local debt fund at Grupo Security SA.】

item.title: 图斯克抨击 "愚蠢的关税战争"，欧盟誓言进行贸易报复
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）兑现其最近的威胁，欧洲有能力对美国的新关税做出反应。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said that Europe has the capacity to react to new US tariffs if President Donald Trump follows through on his recent threats, joining a chorus of European leaders pledging to retaliate if necessary.】

item.title: 中国可从关税倒计时中吸取第一次贸易战的教训
item.description: 在美国更高的关税生效前几个小时，中国在唐纳德-特朗普的第一场贸易战中采取的反制措施的时间表仍然为接下来会发生什么提供了最好的线索。【原文：Hours before higher US tariffs go into effect, the timeline of China’s countermeasures during Donald Trump’s first trade war still offers the best clues to what happens next.】

item.title: 中央银行新行长上任，加纳通胀放缓
item.description: 在新任央行行长准备执掌央行之际，加纳的年通货膨胀率五个月来首次下降。【原文：Ghana’s annual inflation rate fell for the first time in five months, as a new governor prepared to take the helm of the central bank.】

item.title: 沃伯格和伯克希尔合伙人同意以 30 亿美元收购 Triumph
item.description: 私募股权公司华平投资（Warburg Pincus）和伯克希尔合伙公司（Berkshire Partners）同意以约 30 亿美元（包括债务）的价格将飞机零部件和服务供应商凯旋集团公司（Triumph Group Inc.【原文：Private equity firms Warburg Pincus and Berkshire Partners agreed to take aircraft parts and services supplier Triumph Group Inc. private for about $3 billion, including debt.】

item.title: 希腊旅游中心圣托里尼处于地震高度警戒状态
item.description: 希腊圣托里尼岛的学校已经停课，公众集会也被劝阻，因为继过去两天发生数十次小地震之后，当地政府对这个著名的旅游胜地发出了大地震的高度警报。【原文：Schools have been shut and public gatherings are being discouraged on the Greek island of Santorini as local authorities put the popular tourist spot on high alert for a big earthquake, following scores of small temblors over the last two days.】

item.title: 欧盟检察官在印度钢铁欺诈案中锁定德国公司
item.description: 欧洲检察官突袭了一家德国公司的办公室，该公司涉嫌实施一项涉及印度钢铁进口的欺诈计划。【原文：European prosecutors have raided the offices of a German company suspected of running a fraud scheme involving Indian steel imports.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀意外加快，支持欧洲央行的谨慎态度
item.description: 欧元区通胀率意外加快，支持了欧洲中央银行谨慎的降息态度，同时，萎靡不振的经济面临着来自美国日益加剧的贸易威胁。【原文：Euro-area inflation unexpectedly accelerated, supporting the European Central Bank’s cautious approach to lowering interest rates while the sputtering economy faces intensifying trade threats from the US.】

item.description: 利雅得航空公司（Riyadh Air）正在与波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：Riyadh Air is in negotiations with Boeing Co. and Airbus SE for an order of as many as 50 additional widebody aircraft as the Saudi Arabian airline seeks to expand its fleet to help turn the country into an aviation and tourism hub.】

item.title: 高盛高管科斯丁警告：特朗普关税影响收益，美国 500 指数将下挫
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：There’s a risk of a 5% slump in US stocks over the coming months as the latest round of tariffs by the Trump administration crimp earnings forecasts, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 欧元触及 2022 年低点后，平价只是时间问题而非是否问题
item.description: 欧元与美元平价曾一度被认为是不可能的事。现在看来，这是不可避免的。【原文：Euro parity with the dollar once seemed like an outside bet. Now it looks like an inevitability.】

item.title: 欧佩克+将审查石油供应限制措施，特朗普关税令市场动荡不安
item.description: 欧佩克+"主要成员国将于周一齐聚在线，召开审查会议，预计他们将维持目前的供应计划不变。【原文：Key OPEC+ members are due to gather online Monday for a review meeting at which they’re expected to leave current supply plans unchanged.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长西姆库斯认为 3 月后将有更多降息举措
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员吉迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，欧洲中央银行很可能在下次会议后降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank is likely to lower borrowing costs beyond its next meeting, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 特朗普对北美征收关税也将重创亚洲盟友
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普计划对墨西哥和加拿大征收的关税也对美国在亚洲的一些最亲密盟友造成了打击。【原文：Donald Trump’s planned tariffs on Mexico and Canada are also dealing a blow to some of the US’s closest allies in Asia.】

item.title: 南非工厂因莫桑比克贸易中断而情绪低落
item.description: 由于企业担心莫桑比克大选后的动乱对贸易的影响、最近的航空燃料短缺以及安赛乐米塔尔公司计划关闭其长材生产单位，南非 1 月份的工厂景气连续第三个月下滑。【原文：South Africa’s factory mood fell for the third straight month in January, as business worried about the impact of Mozambique’s post-election unrest on trade, recent jet fuel shortages and the planned closure of ArcelorMittal SA’s longs steel production units.】

item.title: 莱法森银行在俄罗斯的客户为普京的战争机器提供补给
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的文件，总部位于维也纳的莱费森国际银行股份公司（Raiffeisen Bank International AG）一直在从为弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）的军队供货的公司那里赚钱，因为俄罗斯军队在乌克兰咄咄逼人。【原文：Vienna-based Raiffeisen Bank International AG has been making money from firms supplying Vladimir Putin’s military, according to documents seen by Bloomberg, as the Russian army grinds forward in Ukraine.】
